devdoc.title: SmartLoanDiamondBeacon A contract that is authorised to borrow funds using delegated credit. It maintains solvency calculating the current value of assets and borrowings. In case the value of assets held drops below certain level, part of the funds may be forcibly repaid. It permits only a limited and safe token transfer.
